ModMetaData.name: Pawnmorpher
ModMetaData.author: The Pawnmorpher Team
ModMetaData.description:
Become a mad scientist and unleash the power of mechanite mutagen upon the world.
<size=24>Features</size>
- Gather, refine and purify mutagens and antigens into a range of useful products.
- Inject colonists and prisoners with serums that grant them various animal mutations, or can transform them entirely into animals.
- Sapient animals! Formerly human animals can be drafted and perform tasks around the colony, depending on how much sapience remains.
- Tag wild animals to gather their DNA, and then research it to discover new mutations. Build the ultimate hybrid supersoldier and expand your lab.
- Use a variety of mutagenic weaponry to deal with raiders, from melee, to guns, to mortar shells.
<size=24>Dependencies</size>
Requires Humanoid Alien Framework and Hugslib.
